Dated: 19/4/2024
Corrigendum to Addendum to AvSec Circular 11/2017 dated 29,3,2023,

Subject: Minimum Standards of Civil Aviation Security Equipment.

In exercise of powers conferred under Rule 16(1) (a), 61(1) and 62 (1) of the
Aircraft (Security) Rules 2023, Director General, Bureau of Civil Aviation Security,
for the purpose of the safety and security of passengers, crew, ground personnel and
the general public in all matters relating to safeguarding against act of unlawful
interference with civil aviation, directs for insertion in Addendum to AvSec Circular
No. 11/2017 dated: 29.3.2023, regarding Minimum Standards for Civil Aviation
equipment.

2 Para 3A is inserted which will read as under: -

“SA, All upcoming greenfield airports shall plan dual-view X-Ray
machines from the design stage itself.”

3. Para 4 of Addendum to the AvSec Circular 11/2017 dated 29.3.2023 is hereby
omitted.

4. _All other provisions of BCAS Addendum to AvSce Circular 11/2017 dated
29.3.2023 shall remain unchanged.

4. This issued with the approval of Director General, BCAS.
